title: #92Noon Vox in the Box! 9am Hour 4/12 - Dean Evason, Kevin Gorg
description: –PA is in the Box at the Xcel Energy Center ahead of the Wild’s showdown with the Oilers. Wild Head Coach Dean Evason joins at the top to preview the game, and Bally Sports North’s Kevin Gorg joins in on the Wild talk. Then PA and Nordo talk Wolves play in game.
